input_context: The rabbi came in and saw what was going on. And he called the two of them to his office. And he said, you know, "This is what's happening."
output_context: Der Rabbiner kam hinein und sah, was geschah. Und er rief die beiden zu seinem Büro. Und er sagte: "Das ist, was passiert."
output_current: Und der reiche Mann - oh, liebe - fiel auf. "Sie meinen, Gott wollte mein Brot nicht?"

info.input_current_text: And the rich man -- oh, dear -- crestfallen. "You mean God didn't want my bread?"
info.input_context_text: The rabbi came in and saw what was going on. And he called the two of them to his office. And he said, you know, "This is what's happening."
